title: Create an Executor for an Nx Plugin
description: Create an Executor for an Nx Plugin.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the executor?

directory.description: The directory at which to create the executor file. When `--nameAndDirectoryFormat=as-provided`, it will be relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it will be relative to the workspace root.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

includeHasher.description: Should the boilerplate for a custom hasher be generated?

skipLintChecks.description: Do not add an eslint configuration for plugin json files.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the executor in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

project.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. The project will be determined from the directory provided. It will be removed in Nx v19.
